SYSTEM: Master_I_AI_Terminology_in_ontologies_07-10-2010%283%29.pdf: Página 31
31
Glossaries
• List of terms, not always with definitions. 
• Terms usually belong to a subject field 
• Terms are defined according to the meaning in that field only
• Goal: to store the terms of a field and to avoid polisemy 
• Terms structured in trees.
speaker: SYSTEM
